file_name;description;model building based on mcw-pls
class_mcw_pls.py; this is the mcw-pls algorithm but renamed after submission of chemometrica 2019 and dropping all the RSIMPLS functions to keep only SIMPLS and MCW-PLS
mcw_pls_cv.ipynb;cv based on numba
class_pcr.py;pcr class
mcw_pls_module.py;numba functions for mcwpls with corss validation
simpls_module.py;numba functions for simpls with corss validation and all lvs output
